title: (x) "Horizon" condensed bold serif typeface - Times {Yves}
content:
Anybody know what this is? Sure looks familiar.  
Thanks

 [‹ New Pearl Jam album ad](http://web.archive.org/web/20070819154537/http:/typophile.com/node/19695 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Heat magazine typeface - TF Forever {Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070819154537/http:/typophile.com/node/19667 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Bailiwick

comments.content: Weird widths going on here. I smell Adobe Serif (the PDF substitution font).

“Horizon” condensed bold serif typeface  
Did someone else write that topic? I did not and I wrote the original post.  
Is this forum moderated and do they edit your posts?
The forums are moderated, and specifically the Type-ID section for archival/search purposes. If we had everyone naming their thread ’Please ID this font’ it would be chaos.

\> _Did someone else write that topic? I did not and I wrote the original post.  
Is this forum moderated and do they edit your posts?_

At your service. I do however _not_ edit posts\*, only subject lines in order to make it easier for our IDers to quickly identify individual threads. Gotta keep this magnificent identification machine well lubricated. ;^)

_\* The only time we edit the actual content of posts is when they contain links to pirated fonts and other stuff that is prohibited on this board._
BTW Your sample is [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20070819154537/http:/typophile.com/wiki/squooshed) Times with a stroke added.
